snippet: Commuters on the R train were largely underwhelmed by Mayor Bill de Blasio and Senator Charles E. Schumer, who rode the train to bring attention to federal transportation funding.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and Sen Charles E Schumer ride subway and hand out leaflets in bid to raise awareness for national Stand Up for Transportation Day, urging Congress to increase transportation funding; presence of senator and mayor draws reactions ranging from unconcerned to surprised.
lead_paragraph: Commuters on the R train were largely underwhelmed by Mayor Bill de Blasio and Senator Charles E. Schumer, who rode the train to bring attention to federal transportation funding.

headline.main: De Blasio and Schumer Take the Subway. Many Fellow Riders Shrug.
headline.print_headline: De Blasio and Schumer Take the Morning Train. Many Fellow Riders Shrug.
